welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Peka, Lesotho! Known for its breathtaking landscapes and warm hospitality, we invite you to immerse yourself in the charm of our city and explore all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories here in Peka."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Leribe Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Leribe Airport handles the transportation of goods and freight.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Seshutes Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Moshoeshoe International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Moshoeshoe International Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
